content: Blackjack.fun is an online crypto casino platform that provides both in-house and partner games. We accept various cryptocurrencies. Blackjack.fun has been operating since 2018. With updates and improvements every week since, the platform aims to compete with older, bigger sites. Blackjack.fun's greatest achievement is its community. The members can get involved in the functionality of the platform, they can bring improvements, change various aspects of the experience and even suggest games. All these are meant to provide their members a unique experience, an honest, transparent and safe approach, and a place shaped based on their perspective.We are looking for some good Twitter profiles for posting tweets for us. We will pay $2/ tweet.        Rules and RequrementsYou must follow @blackjack_fun twitter profileBrand-new accounts are not allowed.Alternative accounts are not acceptedOne tweet per userThe Twitter profile must have more than 50 followers.Twitter audit score must be above 90%You must use the tweet format from below.You can not delete the tweet that you will do for this campaign in at least 1 monthIf you are tagged by a DT for a legitimate reason you can not participate in this campaignIf you don't follow the requirements you will not get paid.I have the right to stop the campaign any time we want.Bot or fake followers will not be paidPayment$2 worth of BTC will be credited to your bitcoin wallet. Payment will be sent after submitting your task.Tweet FormatCode:USDT Airdrop on http://Blackjack.fun Chat. - Follow @blackjack_fun- Retweet and like this tweet- Comment "twitter sent me" in  http://blackjack.fun Chat. -Airdrop Guaranteed. You must have to add an image from below     https://imgur.com/2nq5PmF                                 https://imgur.com/5a5F7akHow to ApplyCode:Your bitcointalk profile link:Your Twitter profile link:Your Twitter audit link: Your Twitter followers: Your correct BTC Address:How to Submit workIf you are accepted, Please follow all requirements, make a tweet, and submit the task by using this form.https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdi7NeF_zgwAVdtgGXvOJojlfDgH7kZjELJ579wlcNCHwtafg/viewformSpreadsheethttps://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1JSoUX2HAgo1dsBksvNgq3OR8HXBSH24yDVUuiVOAXH8/edit?resourcekey#gid=1010873206
